/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and urban architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is captured from a low angle, adding depth and perspective to the view. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
